```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# load the raw icd data

load(file="V:/FACULTY/DJLEMAS/EHR_Data/raw/READ_ONLY_DATASETS/10year_data/analysis_ready/maternal_codes.RData")

# convert "decimal" --> "short" format
data_icd <- icdDxDecimalToShort(dxDataFile = maternal_codes,
                            icdColName = diagnosis_code,         
                            dateColName = diagnosis_start_date,
                            icd10usingDate = "2015/10/01")

data_icd$ICD

data.maternal=maternal_codes %>%
  mutate()


```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# unique codes
maternal_data_tmp=maternal_codes %>%
  select(diagnosis_code,diagnosis_description)
codes=unique(maternal_data_tmp$diagnosis_code) %>% as_tibble()

# convert codes with ICD package
cancer_match=cancer %>%
  mutate(match=ifelse(Code %in% codes )==T, TRUE, FALSE)
